 was just replayed on PBS. I managed to see most of it while intermitently sneaking off to the kitchen to visit the fridge and toast a few munchies.
 
 It said a lot about men's bravery and women's expectations of men. I remember seeing it some years ago but it didn't seem as good then.

 The guy from Kiss acts also? Never knew that.

Actually, Jean Simmons was pretty much a hotty back in '58. She surely turned my straight XXX on!
Okay, I just watched The Wizard of Oz this weekend after a several year hiatus. Those flying monkies still creep me out.
